youtube.title: Why You Should NEVER Pull Out Your Hair | Biology Explained
youtube.description: Discover the microscopic impact of hair pulling on your scalp and follicles. This detailed biology animation explains why preserving your hair roots is essential for long-term growth and scalp health. Don't damage your follicles! #biology #haircare #science
